Module csvl10n

source code

classes that hold units of comma-separated values (.csv) files (csvunit) or entire files (csvfile) for use with localisation

Classes [hide private]
  SimpleDictReader
  DefaultDialect
  csvunit
  csvfile
This class represents a .csv file with various lines.
